column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Range Rover hit a tuk tuk at 1:30 pm on September 28
column7: Khan Chamkar Mon.------Six  school children were injured in the incident. The white Range Rover 2Q-2222 was being driven by a 41 year old Chinese woman ZHNANG YANZHE.------

column1: The tuktuk was carrying six school children
column2: three boys and three girls aged from six to ten
column3: to the nearby Chinese school of Tuan Hoa. The street was narrow and had parked cars on either side
column4: and neither parties wanted to yield to the other.------The police arrived on the scene to investigate.------More photos: ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/712197.html------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%9F%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%B8%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%93%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%87%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%8F%E1%9E%B7%E1%9E%85%E1%9E%B7%E1%9E%93%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%BE%E1%9E%80%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%90/------  ------
